Package hms.boundary.administrator.ReplenishRequest

Class ReplenishRequestView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.administrator.ReplenishRequest.ReplenishRequestView
public class ReplenishRequestView extends View
The ReplenishRequestView class manages the user interface for viewing and handling replenishment requests. It displays pending requests, allows the user to select and approve or deny requests, and handles user input.

  • Method Details

    • displayHeader

      public void displayHeader()
      Displays the header for the Replenish Request view. It provides a bordered text representation with the title "Replenish Request".
      Specified by:
      displayHeader in class View

    • displayRequests

      public void displayRequests(List<ReplenishRequest> replenishRequests)
      Displays a list of replenishment requests. It shows the medicine name and the amount to be added for each request.
      Parameters:
      replenishRequests - a list of replenish requests to be displayed.

    • getRequestChoice

      public int getRequestChoice(int sizeOfList)
      Prompts the user to select a replenishment request from the list.
      Parameters:
      sizeOfList - the total number of replenish requests.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer corresponding to the selected request index.

    • emptyRequests

      public void emptyRequests()
      Displays a message indicating there are no pending replenishment requests.

    • getConfirmation

      public int getConfirmation()
      Prompts the user to confirm whether they would like to approve, deny, or cancel the replenishment request.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer (1 for approve, 2 for deny, 3 for cancel).
